txt.en:
'I have polished up and tinkered with these glass-spider legs as much as I can. There is naught more I can do...either they will work, or we shall be wandering in the dark.

'Unfortunately, I have too much to do here, or I would repair the lamps myself. I will have to leave that task in your capable hands.

'The posts are all over Gabil-munz, south-west of here. Go out there and repair those lamp-posts, then return to me when you are done.'
'So, they worked! I never doubted my craftsmanship. Never had a doubt.'
'If those lamps are not repaired, we cannot safely run supplies between the camps.'
'I think we will soon have to find new materials for the lamps...the use of spider-legs is simply too distasteful, nor are they very efficient.'
Thrand has polished the glass-spider legs and prepared them to be placed inside the empty lamp-posts.
The empty lamp-posts can be found all over Gabil-munz, south-west of the Rotting Cellar.\n\nThrand would like you to place the polished glass-spider legs inside the posts to repair them.
Talk to Thrand in the Rotting Cellar
Thrand is in the Rotting Cellar, north-east of Gabil-munz.\n\nYou should return to Thrand and inform him the glass-spider legs worked and the lamp-posts have been repaired.
